title: anyone else miss the old gangplank?
body:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=o4QUfd-sUYo 

badass pirate who had a touch of charm to him

now all we get is a grumpy ass old guy who wants to kiLL everything. so boring

replies.body:
I miss him everyday. Both gameplay and VO wise. Ah the good old days.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jFS4kqOYbAk
This is what Captain Gangplank should have been.
If they left current abilities, and put in old voiceover, it would be 10/10

If you're talking about gameplay, nope.

If you meant the old voicelines, a little.

PREPARE TO BE BOARDED

yes i miss him they deleted him in replaced him with a generic "badass" pirate
